name: Mt. Ribbit
description:
Mt.Ribbit - a short climbing game by sinu

There was a frog, wondering what would be on the top of the mountain.
One day, he thought he could just climb the mountain - to see what lies on there by himself.

Use Mouse to guide the frog to the top of the mountain.
There is no save feature, you must make it in one shot.
Press ESC to take a break.
